title: Moon Phase Pro
summary: 3D display of moon phase, angle, and rise/set times. Now with eclipses too!
developerAddress:
1338 Grand Ave
Glenwood Springs, CO 81601
USA
description: Spectacular, interactive 3D simulation of the moon, right down to the shadows in the craters and earthshine on the dark side. Touch screen control changes date and time as seen from your location - the phase tracks your every move. Or use two fingers to spin the moon itself: see the far side!One of Yahoo! News' Best Stargazing Apps, and one of Appolicious' Best Moon Phase Android AppsFeatures:▶ For any date/location, instantly shows phase, crescent angle, rise/set times, and nearest syzygies▶ New in version 7: shows supermoons, blue moons, and black moons▶ Displays lunar eclipses (beta)▶ Change phase by touchscreen or direct date entry▶ 2 finger drag rotates the 3D moon simulation▶ Lunar Calendar shows month's phases at a glance▶ Data pane gives additional details: azimuth, altitude, distance, apogee, perigee, zenith, and more▶ Android Wear watch face shows the same imagery, plus (optionally) abbreviated data▶ Supplies moon data & imagery via complications to other Wear 2 watch faces ▶ Choice of imagery: High definition or Maximum realism▶ Share moon image & data via social media▶ Fully optimized for Chromebooks and tablets▶ Notifications for major phases, also optimized for Android Wear▶ Live wallpaper ▶ Resizable home screen widget, with optional moon info text▶ Dynamic shadows of surface features (craters, mountains, etc.)For a bit of fun, check out our trailer video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vc42F2Awxi8
descriptionHTML:
Spectacular, interactive 3D simulation of the moon, right down to the shadows in the craters and earthshine on the dark side. Touch screen control changes date and time as seen from your location - the phase tracks your every move. Or use two fingers to spin the moon itself: see the far side!

One of Yahoo! News' Best Stargazing Apps, and one of Appolicious' Best Moon Phase Android Apps

Features:
▶ For any date/location, instantly shows phase, crescent angle, rise/set times, and nearest syzygies
▶ New in version 7: shows supermoons, blue moons, and black moons
▶ Displays lunar eclipses (beta)
▶ Change phase by touchscreen or direct date entry
▶ 2 finger drag rotates the 3D moon simulation
▶ Lunar Calendar shows month's phases at a glance
▶ Data pane gives additional details: azimuth, altitude, distance, apogee, perigee, zenith, and more
▶ Android Wear watch face shows the same imagery, plus (optionally) abbreviated data
▶ Supplies moon data & imagery via complications to other Wear 2 watch faces
▶ Choice of imagery: High definition or Maximum realism
▶ Share moon image & data via social media
▶ Fully optimized for Chromebooks and tablets
▶ Notifications for major phases, also optimized for Android Wear
▶ Live wallpaper
▶ Resizable home screen widget, with optional moon info text
▶ Dynamic shadows of surface features (craters, mountains, etc.)

For a bit of fun, check out our trailer video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vc42F2Awxi8
comments: Been using this app for more than 3 years and it's never failed to work ! It's a app I do use, week in week out ..

Bad navigation and lack of rise/set times. Can't step reliably 24h back and forth i single day view. No rise/set times from month view even with a tablet, removed? Otherwise ok I guess, with a nice widget, useless for me compared to a simple a table.
After using the app for 6 years, it's  still great for photographers.  A one stop place for both moon and sun phase tracking, especially for long-term trip planning.
Notification keeps popping up even when u uncheck "persist"...
An absolutely beautiful app that I've owned for many years and still love.
Been using since 2014 and like using as my wall paper. I love and have waiting for the current update with the blue, black moon's and solar eclipse.
recentChanges: • Add Supermoons, Blue Moons and Black Moons
• Add some new fields to Data page
• Add a couple of items to About screen
• Overhaul watch face: add Analog style, more complications
• Improve complications provided to other faces
